website_summaries.verdict: Although it's affordable, this bag isn't strong enough for most intermediate to experienced users.
pros: Ideal for anyone seeking a bag that doesn't come pre-filled
cons: Made of a lighter weight material that shows signs of use over time

customer_reviews.title: ... outer leather part - which made me a little disappointed the add wasn’t
customer_reviews.text: I was unaware when i bought the item that the insert to the punching bag wasn’t included - so it’s just the outer leather part - which made me a little disappointed the add wasn’t clearer
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very economical bag—filled mine with a small bag of sand at the bottom ,sawdust in the middle and another bag of sand at the top for compression ...bag is strong —been using it a couple of months now —no signs of tear —came with hook up chain ..I had to get accustomed to the feeling of punching a fabric bag instead of leather which is more comfortable (guess this is good training for real fight ).great economical buy and value for money once you get accustomed to the feel of punching the fabric material
customer_reviews.author: tazzman

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bag is holding up good. After reading some of the reviews I got worried about the bottom ripping so as soon as I filled I tapped the bag half the way up with Gorilla tape. I used 15 pounds of bagged sand in bottom, topped with old blanket, added 15 more lbs and topped with old blanket. Im gonna add 15 more to the top soon. Its better hitting the gorilla tape btw, makes the bag tougher and landing better. I plan on taping it all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: HDR

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bag has a tear already at day 3. I understand this is a cheaper product and wouldn't expect it to last forever, but day 3 really. And I've used it for maybe an hour between those 3 days. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lozolla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy durable bag. I filled it with clothing scraps. I can really beat on it hard, and it doesn't get hurt and it doesn't hurt my hands. What a great concept. An empty punching bag you can fill with anything you want to fill it with- make it heavy or light, soft or firm. I made mine soft and medium weight- perfect for hitting hard without making my hands hurt. Great produt.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda Este

customer_reviews.title: Seam separation
customer_reviews.text: This bag arrived on January 29th and I hung it up on the 31st. I’ve used it two days so far and when I started to use it today (2/04/20) I found an area of separation in the top seam. I did not inspect it closely when I was filling it but I expect that I would have seen this issue if it had been this bad at that time. I will try to sew it back and reinforce it better. The bag seems durable, just check the seams when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Vance

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag if you have a ton of clothes and towels to fill it
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Filling the bag is time consuming but my closet is looking a lot better.. Bag quality is decent and should last a long time. Reviewers advise not to fill with sand so I didn't but I think the bag can handle it. Maybe rice would work too. Clothes make the bag a little lumpy but you can punch the lumps away. My bag weighs out at 47 lbs with clothes alone so adding weight is something I need to do. Good price for a beginner bag only missing a mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Alright it is good and lasted a good while I’m saying this cuz it was my fault it ripped cuz i kept stabbing it which is my bad. But if your wondering if it comes filled than no it doesn’t. Either filly it with a bunch of old clothes or sand.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: I took the approach of putting a little sand in it then putting in a big roll of bubble wrap then put sand around it works ok lo
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt look right even with 75lbs of sand in it. I took the approach of putting a little sand in it then putting in a big roll of bubble wrap then put sand around it works ok looks like a punching bag but just so so.
customer_reviews.author: John Somon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heavy Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a top quality Canvas Heavy Bag that holds up to a lot of punching punishment. You can fill it with what ever you like. I filled mine with a 20 lb. weight at the bottom for stability and the rest with Heavy Duty Memory foam and it works GREAT. I highly recommend this Heavy Bag. Don't forget to order the rafter hardware for it to attach to the main beam.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm J. Mitchell Paralegal

customer_reviews.title: this bag is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I feel this bag up with so much sand I can't even get it off the hooks and still holding strong after a year
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: and i like it cause she cab trashed he anger out on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. We loves it, she get to exercise with it, and i like it cause she cab trashed he anger out on it instead of fusing at me
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Its perfect once filled and helps my boys when angry. Four teenagers have given it a beating and it still looks brand new. It came right on time, chains included and set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fill with some sand and rags.
customer_reviews.text: I filled the bag with about 4 pounds of sand in a container in the bottom. Then rags to about 1/2 " of the top and anther container of about 1 pound of sand.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have old clothes you are to lazy to get rid of? Put them in this punching bag. I did. Fill it & hang it. Let gravity do the rest. Eventually you won't be able to fit anything else in it. I'd wear gloves or hand wraps. Material is a little rough on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag and stuffed it with clothes. It works great, the only issue I had with it is the chain got tangled at the top. This was probably my fault but it was difficult to untangle it once I had it fully stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Raul209

customer_reviews.title: Have no idea at the moment...a guess..filler
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived on time as stated. I have not gotten to use it as it did not come filled, so I have to purchase appropriate filler (not clothes or trash bags) so it will be resistant and sturdy with appropriate filler weight. As far as the material, I have not opened it to test. The price is fair for being just the bag and hanging chain gear.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie Sales

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but a great value!
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best bag I've had. But for the price of it last a year the way I rail on bags I'll buy 6 more
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Will come apart. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This come apart as in material just shredded after a two weeks of use once I put it up. It literally tore apart and threads come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Enixam

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bag
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, just fill with layers of old clothes. Quick delivery, bag will out last me.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Tire

customer_reviews.title: Great punching bag
customer_reviews.text: Great punching bag! The quality is perfect! My husband and son love to use this every day! My favorite thing about this bag is we fill it with old clothes. Doesn't matter if they are torn, stained or out dated! Instead of throws away old clothes we now recycle them in this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three!

customer_reviews.title: Fill it with stuffed animals and let your kids go at it instead of each other!
customer_reviews.text: Super! My 6 year old loves it. He does his ninja moves to it and can get his energy out on the bag. We filled it with stuffed animals so it's not so hard when he hits it. It has swung back on him and knocked him over, but it didn't hurt. I probably wouldn't recommend it for anyone younger than 6 due to the swing back motion because kids tend to push it when they hit it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I just wish it wasn’t a canvas material as it can cause blistering. Make sure you purchase sand to fill the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: You really need to scourage for filling on this.....but other wise a good sturdy purchase
customer_reviews.author: chrissys traveling circus

customer_reviews.title: Son was excited
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy bag for the price. After reading other reviews we bought rubber mulch to fill it. Hoping it holds up well. I will update if not but this was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: kerri walker

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag a few weeks ago and I am very satisfied with it. I like the fact that you can put old clothes in it. I filled mine with old blankets and towels. It is kinda light though... It goes around like crazy, but it serves it's purpose. I didn't find anything wrong with it as f yet. I use it 3 times a week for 40 minutes, and so does my 9 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Morena

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag . I took an old memory foam mattress topper and lined the inside with it. Cut pierce for bottom and rolled the rest then filled center roll with 60 pounds of sand. It's perfect and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Punching bag holds up to heavy use and gives great results.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how sturdy this bag is considering its reasonable price. This is a great way to stay in shape and to relieve frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Johnson of JohnSongs

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in filled up as pictured.. you must buy your own sand.
customer_reviews.author: Nori

customer_reviews.title: Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes an empty bag that you can fill yourself. I used Sand and cedar animal bedding mixed. I know that the sand will settle, but then I can unzip it and empty it again to remix. I have had other heavy bags before and once they settle you are stuck. the quality is also great and I like the canvas bags better anyway. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The part where the chains hook up to the bag, started ripping after a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: -) great product and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is for my 13 year old son. He is spending hours building up his muscles. :-) great product and quick delivery. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: taridexter

customer_reviews.title: punching
customer_reviews.text: this is for our son. he punched it so well it came down from the ceiling on the porch. we will have to get a heavy-duty toggle to put in when we replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking this would be a nice starter bag for my 12 year old. After the hassle of filling with sand and rags, adding extra chains to drop it to the right height, the bag is tearing after one day and it's not even that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: SBuckley

customer_reviews.title: great way to get aggression out for the kids
customer_reviews.text: it comes empty, so be prepared for that. we've used old clothes and rags to fill it. it has to be mounted, too, so that's an extra expense. we have it hanging from an I-beam in our basement. great way to get aggression out for the kids.... and adults.
customer_reviews.author: AplJaks

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured... Its a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what is pictured... Its a very small punching bag. Not what I had in mind, the photo shows a full size punch I g bag and this definitely is not full size... Its about 1/4 sized
customer_reviews.author: Js

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: does the job, but too much of a hassle to file, spend the extra money and get one prefilled.
customer_reviews.author: MindChamber

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is OK for the price. If you want a quality bag you should get a more expensive one. This one works for me with just daily workouts. I would recommend getting a more expensive bag if you want quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift for fathers day so we havent used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The zipper is a very poor design. It arrived new but the zipper was ...
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is a very poor design. It arrived new but the zipper was stuck shut. I tried everything, oiling the zipper, using pliers, tools to try to open it. Nothing worked, I would have had to rip the zipper out of the bag to fill it. I am returning it for a refund and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: nice bag
customer_reviews.text: u can fill with anything, very sturdy. filled with old clothes and not heavy at all. Very nice punching bag
customer_reviews.author: SmileyFace003

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bag was a pain in the butt to fill (internal sandbag/pillows/old clothing), and started ripping after a few days. The plastic zipper (why they used plastic, I have no idea) broke almost immediately. After using the bag for about 2 weeks, the vinyl side pieces have started to come off, and the anchor points have tearing. We've got it duct taped around the top and it seems to be holding up, but we shouldn't have to be repairing a bag this soon after purchase. Very disappointed, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: babybabayaga

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This punching bag is substantial and well built. Filling it myself was easy and my grandson loves it. I think it will suit his needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: this is great for a beginners bag my son is 13 and ...
customer_reviews.text: this is great for a beginners bag my son is 13 and starting out i read some bad reviews and was concerned at first though the quality is great the sewing is good and it is holding the weight good
customer_reviews.author: michelle cepeda

customer_reviews.title: Ripped by 15th use if you like to go bare knuckle it will tear the skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Ripped by 15th use if you like to go bare knuckle it will tear the skin off your knuckles it's made of cloth basically

customer_reviews.title: ... it for my daughter and she is getting a good work out with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter and she is getting a good work out with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy! Needs some kind of weight in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! Needs some kind of weight in the center. We filled a 6" diameter tube with sand and surrounded with rags. Easy to hang.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag is Awesome. it can take hard heavy hits and it hasn't let up yet.

customer_reviews.title: was a great punching bag and still is
customer_reviews.text: o))) 2️⃣☠️📣💣💥this was a great punching bag its still somewhere with me i have to go find it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P Charles

customer_reviews.title: Very tough bag
customer_reviews.text: Very tough, I practice wooden bat baseball swings on this with newspaper inside the bag. Had a previous bag that was black and either vinyl/leather and it ruptured, while this has held up well with even harder swings against it.
customer_reviews.author: MGM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bag. I knew ahead of time that I would need to fill the bag because I did read the WHOLE description of the product. I filled the bottom with 20# of cat litter & then stuffed the rest with old pillows. Getting the pillows in the bag was a work out in itself. I also purchased a chain & carabiner so I can adjust the height of the bag. It is important to install the eye hook into a beam so you have proper support for the bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rebello

customer_reviews.title: Great Punching Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great Punching Bag, good quality and takes a betting and stays together.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Make it as heavy or as light as one wants.

customer_reviews.title: The black faux leather tears pretty quickly, but the canvas base layer is solid ...
customer_reviews.text: The black faux leather tears pretty quickly, but the canvas base layer is solid and lasting. I use this with boxing gloves and wooden martial arts weapons and it holds up great.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: YOu get what you pay for. For the price it will do for now.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to hang and seems pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: i ought this for my 17 yr old. he loves it, it was easy to hang and seems pretty durable.

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time just use play sand and gloves ...

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Finishing touches not of a great quality but awesome for the price and what I need it for....for now at least😁
customer_reviews.author: Phily

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop laying into it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I can't stop laying into it every time I walk by. I lined mine with a lawn/leaf bag and filled it with a mix of of whole-kernel corn (for horses/cows) and shredded paper bedding (for small animals) for less than $14. I was heavy on the corn (added the whole 30 lb. bag) for a good firm, heavy bag. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Loading was a fun project with the family
customer_reviews.text: I beat the hell of it and it stays together. Loading was a fun project with the family, then we all had fun beating on it mercilessly!

customer_reviews.title: Great material used! As described!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Sturdy appearing material. Comes with hardware. As described!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Made of canvas, seems to be pretty sturdy, I filled mine with a mixture of as much carpet padding I could fit and sand to fill in the gaps, I probably used about 75lbs of sand.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Great punching bag for my three 12 year old grandsons. Probably not for over 16 year olds.

customer_reviews.title: fun while it lasted

customer_reviews.title: great heavy bag!

customer_reviews.text: Overall the punching bag is a good product unfortunately the one I received had a broken zipper on it

customer_reviews.text: I stuffed it full of plastic shopping bags, recycled them.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a teen punching bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, well built, quick shipping. Filled it with old clothes and hung it from garage rafters.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't need something to punch every now and then? I bought this for my son at Christmas and googled how to fill it. One person suggested lining the bag with carpet padding and getting bags of old clothes from local thrift shop (most will sell unsellable items by the pound). We did as instructed, lined, packed, stuffed, and jammed the clothes in there. It still needed a bit more weight since this bag is small and can't fit a lot of rags. So it we also added bags of sand. We put the sand in zip locks and wrapped it with duct tape and hid it in-between layers of cloth. All in all it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Lasted abouut 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I filled this bag with 60lbs of sand, and some towels and notebooks. It fell apart pretty quickly, there is a feel small, and one large tear on it. I would not recommend it unless you wanna fill it up with really light things such as clothes, and towels only, it can be good for a cardio workout and stress relief, but if you are a serious fighter than you should not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Dsp586

customer_reviews.title: Best investment in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my energetic 17 year old grandson. Best investment in a long time.

product_meta.title: Last Punch Heavy Duty Punching Bag with Chains
product_meta.description: Pro Quality Heavy Duty Black Canvas Punching Bag Great for Boxing Practice One Heavy Duty Canvas Punching Bag You can fill up with what ever you desire,(plastic bags, old clothes, cotton or Etc.) Bag is 48" Long with Chains, 33" without Chains and 18" Wide
feature_bullets: Pro Quality Heavy Duty Black Canvas Punching Bag
One Heavy Duty Canvas Punching Bag
You can fill up with what ever you desire,(plastic bags, old clothes, cotton or Etc.)
Bag is 48" Long with Chains, 33" without Chains and 18" Wide
